author: COMSOL
description: Carbon dioxide in aqueous solutions is highly corrosive and can cause significant damage on steel designs. Especially within petrochemical industry such conditions arise in pipes of some applications. This example investigates the corrosion taking place on the steel surface of pipes for turbulent flows of carbon dioxide and water. The influence of temperature and pH is modeled as well.
label: co2_corrosion.mph
